Translations.Text: Kazhutʹ, "O lyudy, yakshcho vy mayete budʹ-yakyy sumniv vidnosno moyeyi relihiyi, ya ne obozhnyuyu shcho vy obozhnyuyete bilya BOHA. YA obozhnyuyu BOHA yedynyy; khto prypynytʹ vashi zhyttya. YA nakazuyusʹ shchob buty viruyuchyy
ya buv nakazanyy: "Utrymayte sebe prysvyachenyy do relihiyi monotheism; vy ne budete idol praktyky obozhnyuyete
Vy ne budete obozhnyuvaty bilya BOHA shcho volodiye niyakoyu potuzhnistyu do vyhody vy abo shkoda vy. Yakshcho vy, vy budete porushnyk

Yakshcho BOH torkayetʹsya vas z neharazdamy, nikhto ne mozhete relieve tse krim Vin. Ta koly Vin blahoslovlyaye vas, niyaka syla ne mozhe zavazhyty Yoho charivnosti. Vin daruye tse na whomever Vin vybyraye z chysla Yoho sluzhbovtsiv. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy

Proholoshuyutʹ: "O lyudy, pravda prybula do vas herein z vashoho Lorda. Whoever keruyetʹsya keruyetʹsya dlya yoho vlasnyy harnyy. Ta whoever ide astray, ide astray do yoho vlasnoho zbytku. YA ne zakinchuyusʹ okhoronetsʹ vy
Slidkuyete shcho vidkryvayetʹsya do vas, ta patsiyent do BOHA vydaye Yoho vyrok; Vin yavlyaye soboyu krashchoho suddyu
